id.description: The unique identifier of the collector.

status.description: Current status of the collector (ex: open, closed).

survey_id.description: The unique identifier of the survey associated with the collector.

name.description: The name or title of the collector.

thank_you_message.description: Message displayed after respondent completes the survey.

thank_you_page.description: Settings for the thank you page displayed post-survey submission.

is_enabled.description: Indicates if the thank you page is enabled.

message.description: Custom message to be displayed on the thank you page.

disqualification_message.description: Message displayed if respondent is disqualified from survey.

disqualification_url.description: URL to redirect disqualified respondent to another page.

close_date.description: The date and time when the collector is set to close.

closed_page_message.description: Message displayed on the closed page of the collector.

redirect_url.description: URL for redirection after survey completion.

display_survey_results.description: Indicates whether respondents can view survey results.

edit_response_type.description: Type of editing available for responses.

anonymous_type.description: Specifies the anonymity type of the respondent (ex:

allow_multiple_responses.description: Indicates whether multiple responses are allowed for this collector.

date_modified.description: The date and time when the collector was last modified.

sender_email.description: Email address used as the sender of collector notifications.

password_enabled.description: Indicates whether password protection is enabled for the collector.

response_limit.description: Limit on the number of responses allowed for the collector.

redirect_type.description: Type of redirect behavior after respondent submits the survey.

href.description: The unique URL of the collector.
